channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- NPM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- NPM

item.title: CVE-2021-35225|2024-09-17T00:11:06.373Z -- solarwinds -- npm
item.description: Each authenticated Orion Platform user in a MSP (Managed Service Provider) environment can view and browse all NetPath Services from all that MSP's customers. This can lead to any user having a limited insight into other customer's infrastructure and potential data cross-contamination.
